1{-# LANGUAGE ScopedTypeVariables #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | CSV output.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Writer.Csv
7  ( resultCsv,
8    resultCsvHeading,
9    resultTsvHeading,
10  ) where
11
12import qualified Data.Char                 as Ch
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture  as O
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base      as B
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax    as S
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data      as D
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core      as C
18
19
20-- --------------------------------------------  Writer
21
22-- | Comman-separated-values output without heading.
23resultCsv :: (D.CContent c) => C.ResultWriter c
24resultCsv = C.ResultWriterChunk "csv" $ hPutXsv csvSetting
25
26-- | Comman-separated-values output with heading.
27resultCsvHeading :: (D.CContent c) => C.ResultWriter c
28resultCsvHeading = C.ResultWriterChunk "csv-heading" $ hPutXsv csvHeadSetting
29
30-- | Tab-separated-values output with heading.
31resultTsvHeading :: (D.CContent c) => C.ResultWriter c
32resultTsvHeading = C.ResultWriterChunk "tab-heading" $ hPutXsv tabHeadSetting
33
34hPutXsv :: forall c. (D.CContent c) => XsvSetting -> C.ResultWriterChunk c
35hPutXsv setting@XsvSetting { xsvHead = isHead, xsvSep = sep, xsvQuote = quote } h _ status sh =
36    do let csv = concatMap toCsv chunks
37       B.hPutMixLines B.crlfBreak h $ map B.mix csv
38       return status
39    where
40      chunks = concatMap S.shortBody sh
41
42      toCsv :: C.ResultChunk c -> [String]
43      toCsv (C.ResultRel _ (D.Rel he bo)) = appendHead he $ map line bo
44      toCsv _ = []
45
46      join :: [String] -> String
47      join = B.intercalate sep
48
49      line :: [c] -> String
50      line = join . map (csvContent setting)
51
52      appendHead he xs
53          | isHead    = join (map quote $ D.getTermNames he) : xs
54          | otherwise = xs
55
56csvContent :: (D.CContent c) => XsvSetting -> c -> String
57csvContent setting@XsvSetting { xsvQuote = quote } c
58    | D.isCode   c  = quote $ D.gCode c
59    | D.isText   c  = quote $ D.gText c
60    | D.isTerm   c  = quote $ '/' : D.gTerm c
61    | D.isDec    c  = D.encodeDecimalCompact $ D.gDec c
62    | D.isClock  c  = quote $ B.mixToFlatString $ B.mixEncode $ D.gClock c
63    | D.isTime   c  = quote $ B.mixToFlatString $ B.mixEncode $ D.gTime c
64    | D.isBool   c  = boolToString $ D.gBool c
65
66    | D.isList   c  = csvSubContents setting $ D.gList c
67    | D.isSet    c  = csvSubContents setting $ D.gSet c 
68    | otherwise     = D.contString c
69
70csvSubContents :: (D.CContent c) => XsvSetting -> [c] -> String
71csvSubContents setting@XsvSetting { xsvSubSep = sub } cs =
72    B.intercalate sub $ csvContent setting <$> cs
73
74boolToString :: Bool -> String
75boolToString True  = "true"
76boolToString False = "false"
77
78-- --------------------------------------------  Setting
79
80data XsvSetting = XsvSetting
81    { xsvHead     :: Bool
82    , xsvSep      :: String
83    , xsvSubSep   :: String
84    , xsvQuote  :: String -> String
85    }
86
87csvSetting :: XsvSetting
88csvSetting = XsvSetting { xsvHead    = False
89                        , xsvSep     = ","
90                        , xsvSubSep  = "|"
91                        , xsvQuote   = enquote }
92
93tabSetting :: XsvSetting
94tabSetting = XsvSetting { xsvHead    = False
95                        , xsvSep     = "\t"
96                        , xsvSubSep  = "|"
97                        , xsvQuote  = toSpace }
98
99csvHeadSetting :: XsvSetting
100csvHeadSetting = csvSetting { xsvHead = True }
101
102tabHeadSetting :: XsvSetting
103tabHeadSetting = tabSetting { xsvHead = True }
104
105enquote :: O.Map String
106enquote str = '"' : q str where
107    q ""          = ['"']
108    q ('"' : xs)  = '"' : '"' : q xs
109    q (x : xs)    =         x : q xs
110
111toSpace :: O.Map String
112toSpace ""           = ""
113toSpace (x : xs) | Ch.isControl x    = ' ' : xs'
114                 | otherwise         =   x : xs'
115                 where xs' = toSpace xs
116
